ValidationRule.description: COGS should be editable only by API User (for Wiki COGS tool). UBX-AP "00520000000rnjW" can't edit either.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Id<>"0052p00000BkGWt", /* api wiki */ $User.Id<>"00557000006eQYE", /* wsha */ $User.Id<>"00557000007TldC", /* Werner Gr√§tzer */ $User.Id<>"00557000008WnLe", /* ldra */ $User.Id<>"00520000000zbAX", /* khir */ OR( ISCHANGED(COGS_1__c), ISCHANGED(COGS_2__c), ISCHANGED(COGS_3__c), ISCHANGED(COGS_4__c), ISCHANGED(Valid_For_1__c), ISCHANGED(Valid_For_2__c), ISCHANGED(Valid_For_3__c), ISCHANGED(Valid_For_4__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: COGS can be entered only through COGS User Interface (Wiki)
